author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Netflix has delivered a varied selection of movies and shows for subscribers over the years. These include titles licensed from other companies and platforms, original productions, and revivals of beloved properties. Now Netflix has plans to bring back a forgotten series for a second season on their platform. Naturally, subscribers are always interested in having [...]

title: Netflix Bringing Back Forgotten Series For Second Season

description:

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
The Gremlins movie franchise is finally getting another installment. It’s just been announced that not only has a new Gremlins movie been greenlit, but it already has a release date, with the franchise’s return scheduled for 2027 with Gremlins 3. Fans have waited decades for another Gremlins movie following the release of Gremlins 2: The [...]

The post ‘Gremlins 3’ Gets Official 2027 Release Date appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘Gremlins 3’ Gets Official 2027 Release Date

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
Details regarding the future of the Conjuring franchise have been mixed following the release of The Conjuring: Last Rites. There have been reports that the sequel is the last of the film franchise, while other reports claim that a television series is in development. Now a prequel movie to The Conjuring is reportedly in the [...]

The post ‘The Conjuring’ Prequel Movie Reportedly In The Works appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: ‘The Conjuring’ Prequel Movie Reportedly In The Works

author: Jacob Dressler
description:
MTV viewers will be shocked to learn that the network has officially canceled one of its most popular shows after 46 seasons on the air. The series ran on MTV for quite a few years, leading to one of the network’s longest-running shows that also will have the highest episode count for a MTV series. [...]

title: MTV Cancels Series After 46 Seasons
